请问美国人民如何意识到美国特色的恶果呢？如果只看数字，美国现在已经死了差不多80000人。如果不看数字，看故事

https://nypost.com/2020/03/28/17-year-old-dies-of-coronavirus-was-turned-away-for-lacking-insurance/

17岁少年因为没有保险，得了肺炎没法得到及时治疗，送到医院被拒收，最后病死，这不是体制的错？

https://www.nytimes.com/2020/04/15/nyregion/coronavirus-nj-andover-nursing-home-deaths.html

When the police arrived, the corpse had been removed from the shed, but they discovered 17 bodies piled inside the nursing home in a small morgue intended to hold no more than four people.

在新泽西的养老院，17具尸体就这样堆在一个仓库里，那个仓库本来不应该放超过四个尸体，这么残忍，谁的错？

https://www.nytimes.com/2020/04/27/nyregion/new-york-city-doctor-suicide-coronavirus.html

Dr. Breen, 49, did not have a history of mental illness, her father said. But he said that when he last spoke with her, she seemed detached, and he could tell something was wrong. She had described to him an onslaught of patients who were dying before they could even be taken out of ambulances.

纽约的护士，因为工作压力过大，看着病人得不到救治而死去自杀了，谁的错？

这么残忍的事实摆在面前，美国人还要听着自己的总统讲喝清洁剂的破事，美国人都没有“意识到美国特色的恶果”，凭什么指望中国人意识到中国特色的恶果呢？到底是谁“麻木不仁”？
